plays.text: Goal scored by Robert Reichel assisted by Jeff Farkas
Penalty to Francis Bouillon 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mats Sundin
Penalty to Curtis Joseph 2 minutes for Tripping Doug Gilmour served by Tie Domi
Penalty to Chad Kilger 2 minutes for Tripping Mikael Renberg
Goal scored by Shayne Corson assisted by Darcy Tucker and Robert Reichel
Penalty to Gino Odjick 2 minutes for Roughing Bryan McCabe
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Tripping Gino Odjick
Penalty to Aki Berg 2 minutes for High Sticking Yanic Perreault
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Roughing Yanic Perreault
Goal scored by Sergei Berezin assisted by Yanic Perreault and Stephane Robidas
Penalty to Doug Gilmour 2 minutes for Slashing Robert Reichel
Goal scored by Travis Green assisted by Shayne Corson and Darcy Tucker
Penalty to Alyn McCauley 2 minutes for Tripping Shaun Van Allen
Penalty to Francis Bouillon 2 minutes for Hooking Travis Green
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Jonas Hoglund
Goal scored by Jyrki Lumme unassisted
